fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers

Interface TracerI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TracerConsole, TracerWindow

    public interface TracerI
    The class TracerI declares the common behaviours of tracers for BCM.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2020-06-24

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int getScreenHeight()
      return the screen height; a zero-width means no access to the information.
      default int getScreenWidth()
      return the screen width; a zero-width means no access to the information.
      boolean isSuspended()
      return the trace suspension status.
      boolean isTracing()
      return the tracing status.
      default boolean isVisible()
      return the tracing console visibility status; true by default.
      default void setOrigin(int xOrigin, int yOrigin)
      set the coordinate of the top left point in screen coordinates, if possible.
      default void setRelativePosition(int x, int y)
      set the tracer frame relative coordinates among the frames of the application, if possible.
      default void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
      set the title of the tracer frame, if possible.
      void toggleSuspend()
      toggle the suspend status of the trace.
      void toggleTracing()
      toggle the tracing status.
      default void toggleVisible()
      invert the visibility status of the tracing console, if possible.
      void traceMessage(java.lang.String message)
      show the trace message if the tracing status is true and the suspension status is false.

      • getScreenWidth

        default int getScreenWidth()
        return the screen width; a zero-width means no access to the information.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    ret >= 0
        Returns:
        the screen width.

      • getScreenHeight

        default int getScreenHeight()
        return the screen height; a zero-width means no access to the information.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    ret >= 0
        Returns:
        the screen height.

      • setTitle

        default void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        set the title of the tracer frame, if possible.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        title - title to be put on the frame.

      • setOrigin

        default void setOrigin(int xOrigin,
                       int yOrigin)
        set the coordinate of the top left point in screen coordinates, if possible.

        Contract

         pre     xOrigin >= 0
 pre     xOrigin < getScreenWidth()
 pre     yOrigin >= 0
 pre     yOrigin < getScreenHeight()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        xOrigin - x coordinate of the top left point in screen coordinates.
        yOrigin - y coordinate of the top left point in screen coordinates.

      • setRelativePosition

        default void setRelativePosition(int x,
                                 int y)
        set the tracer frame relative coordinates among the frames of the application, if possible.

        Contract

         pre     x >= 0
 pre     y >= 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        x - x relative coordinates among the frames of the application.
        y - y relative coordinates among the frames of the application.

      • isVisible

        default boolean isVisible()
        return the tracing console visibility status; true by default.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Returns:
        the tracing console visibility status.

      • toggleVisible

        default void toggleVisible()
        invert the visibility status of the tracing console, if possible.

        Contract

         pre     isTracing()
 post    isVisible() == !isVisible()@pre

      • toggleTracing

        void toggleTracing()
        toggle the tracing status.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    isTracing() == !isTracing()@pre
 post    isTracing() == !isSuspended()

      • toggleSuspend

        void toggleSuspend()
        toggle the suspend status of the trace.

        Contract

         pre     isTracing()
 post    isSuspended() == !isSuspended()@pre

      • traceMessage

        void traceMessage(java.lang.String message)
        show the trace message if the tracing status is true and the suspension status is false.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
